thread.title: Morena

author: Morena
title: Morena
text: I was generally happy with my purchases although the quality of Hector Lavoe's "El Cantante" video was a little lacking ( The video pixelizes at the very beginning, yet for the rest of the dvd I had no problems ). Beyond that 1/2 second of delay, I was happy with my purchase and would definitely recommend Oldies.com. In fact, I did not know Oldies.com until the day I made my purchase....I actually am glad I found it since I was looking for items that are rather hard to find. Thanks Old Timer thanks OLDIES.com!
